sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
clash
, se bojujejo, prepirajo ali ne strinjajo drug z drugim.

seg.quote: Youths clashed with police in the streets around the ground.
The delegates clashed from the first day of the congress.
...the first public clash between the two party leaders.

sense.def:
Če prepričanja, zamisli ali lastnosti
clash
, se močno razlikujejo in si zato nasprotujejo.

seg.quote: This belief clashes with all that we know about human psychology.

sense.def:
Če dve prireditvi
clash
, se odvijata hkrati, tako da se ne moremo udeležiti obeh.

seg.quote: A religious convention had clashed with a flower show.

sense.def:
Kadar barve ali slogi
clash
, so skupaj videti grdi.

seg.quote: ...a pink jacket which clashed violently with the colour of her hair.

sense.def:
Kadar kovinski predmeti
clash
, ustvarijo velik hrup, tako da trčijo skupaj.
